{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = RB4011 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC2100 Wireless Gigabit Router with SFP+ |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mikrotik.com/product/rb4011igs_5hacq2hnd_in |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = MikroTik_RouterBOARD_4011_(RB4011iGS+_5HacQ2HnD-IN) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD 4011 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RB4011iGS+5HacQ2HnD-IN/-US |wlclass = AC2100 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TV74011GS-5HQ2HD,TV7R11E2HPND |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Annapurna Labs;Alpine AL21400;AL21400-1400; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz<!-- 1.4 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W29N04GVSIAA; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = GigaDevice;GD25LQ80CSIG; |flash2size = 1 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367SB; |sw2chip = Realtek;RTL8367SB; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 6C:3B:6B |oui = 6C:3B:6B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT;;; |stockos = RouterOS;;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, SFP+, M.2 (SSD) |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_sfp_num = 1 |exp_M.2 = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 24<!-- 12-57 --> |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = <!-- 18-57 --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- 0.42-0.6 --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, SFP+, PoE, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.88.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/02/2018 |estreldate = 09/2018 |estprice = 249 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07PCWLNCR |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B07QMNNVG8 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin3 = B0843PXF7X |asin_country3 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = MikroTik R11e-2HnD |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9582; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :''Powerful 10x Gigabit port router with a quad-core 1.4GHz CPU,'' :''1GB RAM, SFP+ 10Gbps cage, dual band 2.4/5GHz 4x4 MIMO'' :''802.11a/b/g/n/ac wireless and desktop case''
==Links of Interest== [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/product_files/RB4011iGSplus5HacQ2HnD-IN_181032.png Block Diagram]
===Reviews=== *[https://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/MikroTik_News ''MikroTik'' Wiki] â€¢ [https://download2.mikrotik.com/news/news_84.pdf News 09/2018] :CPU: [[Annapurna Labs]] Alpine AL21400 @1.4GHz (Quad Core) <!--(ARM Cortex-A15)--> :Flash: 512MB (NAND), RAM: 1GB (DDR3), 10x GbE LAN, SFP+ :WLAN: 4T4R 802.11ac (QCA9984)/2T2R 802.11bgn (AR9582) *[https://weblance.com.ua/389-mikrotik-gotovit-platformu-rb4011-na-baze-processorov-alpine-zayavlena-podderzhka-dual-band-wi-fi-s-mimo-4x4.html ''MikroTik RB4011'' on '''WebLance'''] (RU) *[https://habr.com/ru/post/422395/ ''MikroTik RB4011'' on '''Habr'''] (RU) *[https://www.mydigit.cn/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=53043 ''MikroTik RB4011'' on '''MyDigit'''] (CN)
